TopicTitle: CK 6 Super Bee from Zokesia Skunkworks

Articles.Content:
By CaptianKornFlake

Our fourth and final plane is the CK 6 Super Bee (far right) and is known to be Jebs favorite of the four (JUST LOOK AT HIS FACE ). It is a low altitude scout and is know for its speed. With its extremely low weight and single jet engine it can reach over 200 m/s at sea level! (WARNING: YOU MAY WANT TO USE FINE CONTROLS) The Super Bee is used to confirm coordinates and scout out enemy bases in the blink of an eye. Just like a bee, one second you will be trying to swat it away from you, next second its gone. Also it's really small.
